createbillingview.name: CreateBillingView
createbillingview.description: Grants permission to create a billing view

deletebillingview.name: DeleteBillingView
deletebillingview.description: Grants permission to delete a billing view

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a billing view resource policy

getbillingdata.name: GetBillingData
getbillingdata.description: Grants permission to perform queries on billing information

getbillingdetails.name: GetBillingDetails
getbillingdetails.description: Grants permission to view detailed line item billing information

getbillingnotifications.name: GetBillingNotifications
getbillingnotifications.description: Grants permission to view notifications sent by AWS related to your accounts billing information

getbillingpreferences.name: GetBillingPreferences
getbillingpreferences.description: Grants permission to view billing preferences such as reserved instance, savings plans and credits sharing

getbillingview.name: GetBillingView
getbillingview.description: Grants permission to get the metadata for a specified billing view

getcontractinformation.name: GetContractInformation
getcontractinformation.description: Grants permission to view the account's contract information including the contract number, end-user organization names, PO numbers and if the account is used to service public-sector customers

getcredits.name: GetCredits
getcredits.description: Grants permission to view credits that have been redeemed

getiamaccesspreference.name: GetIAMAccessPreference
getiamaccesspreference.description: Grants permission to retrieve the state of the Allow IAM Access billing preference

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy specified billing view

getsellerofrecord.name: GetSellerOfRecord
getsellerofrecord.description: Grants permission to retrieve the account's default Seller of Record

listbillingviews.name: ListBillingViews
listbillingviews.description: Grants permission to get a list of all your available billing views

listsourceviewsforbillingview.name: ListSourceViewsForBillingView
listsourceviewsforbillingview.description: Grants permission to get the list of source views for a specified billing view

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to get the list of tags for a specified billing view

putcontractinformation.name: PutContractInformation
putcontractinformation.description: Grants permission to set the account's contract information end-user organization names and if the account is used to service public-sector customers

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to put a billing view resource policy

redeemcredits.name: RedeemCredits
redeemcredits.description: Grants permission to redeem an AWS credit

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a specified billing view

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a specified billing view

updatebillingpreferences.name: UpdateBillingPreferences
updatebillingpreferences.description: Grants permission to update billing preferences such as reserved instance, savings plans and credits sharing

updatebillingview.name: UpdateBillingView
updatebillingview.description: Grants permission to update a billing view

updateiamaccesspreference.name: UpdateIAMAccessPreference
updateiamaccesspreference.description: Grants permission to update the Allow IAM Access billing preference
